name: A+B (Trial Problem)
description:
You are given two integers 
    a
 and 
    b
. Print 
    a+b
. Input The
first line contains an integer 
    t
 (
    1 
    ≤ t 
    ≤ 10^4
) — the
number of test cases in the input. Then 
    t
 test cases follow. Each test
case is given as a line of two integers 
    a
 and 
    b
 (
    -1000 
    ≤ a,
    b 
    ≤ 1000
). Output Print 
    t
 integers — the required numbers

    a+b
. Example Input 4 1 5 314 15 -99 99 123 987 Output 6 329 0 1110
